3. "tumorType": "Plexiform neurofibroma (morphologic abnormality)" was simplified to "Plexiform Neurofibroma", which is an exact match to one of the enumerated values in the Target Schema. The capitalization was also adjusted to match the schema.

These changes ensure that all values match the controlled terminology specified in the Target Schema while broadening overly specific terms.
